analysis.description:
ANtokContractAirdrop.tokensSpent (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#111-112) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- massTransfer (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#128-138)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol:
	Contract ANtokContractAirdrop has payable functions:
	 - changeOwner (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#17-24)
	 - ANtokContractAirdrop (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#113-123)
	 - getBounty (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#165-175)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

ANtokContractAirdrop.withdrawTo (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#143-146) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(_recipient,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#145-146)

ANtokContractAirdrop.withdrawBounty (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#160-163) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-this.transfer(_recipient,_amount) (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#163)

ERC20.transferFrom.allowance (local variable @ /unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#63) shadows:
	- ERC20.allowance (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#88-95)
	- ERC20I.allowance (function @ /unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#35-37)

ANtokContractAirdrop.holdersCount should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#109-111)
ANtokContractAirdrop.tokensSpent should be constant (/unique_chucks/3/0x15e4cf1950ffa338ce5bc59456b3e579ed1bead3.sol#111-112)
